thread.title: PUNJAB LYRICS – Gurdas Maan’s Legendary Song (2017)
thread.title_full: PUNJAB LYRICS – Gurdas Maan’s Legendary Song (2017)

author: lyricsmint
title: PUNJAB LYRICS – Gurdas Maan’s Legendary Song (2017)
text:
92 SHARES Punjab Lyrics: Living legend Gurdas Maan’s heart-wrenching song that will wake you up from this living hell/dream. This Bhagat Singh song PUNJAB is written & sung by Gurdas Maan and composed by Jatinder Shah. Gurdas Maan : PUNJAB | Jatinder Shah | Gurickk G Maan | New Punjabi Songs 2017 | Saga Music 
Gurdas Maan’s new 2017 song “Punjab” has an amazingly beautiful music video conceptualized and directed by none other than his own son Gurickk G Maan. Punjab Lyrics 
Kehda kehda dukh dassan main Punjab da Phull murjhaya peya ae gulaab da (x2) 
Suk gayian jaddan murjhaiyan tahniyan Suk gayian jaddan murjhaiyan tahniyan Chheti kite methon dassiyan ni jaaniyan Chheti kite methon dassiyan ni jaaniyan 
Har paase nashe haneri jhul gayi Har paase nashe haneri jhul gayi Vaddeyan daleran nu daleri bhul gayi Vaddeyan daleran nu daleri bhul gayi Ho das kehda nachuga 
Gabru Punjabi nasheyan ne maarte Rangle Punjabi nasheyan ne maarte (x2) 
Kithe firre bhuli vaddiye Punjabane Tenu aa jiyunde ni jawaak sambhne (x2) 
Dhunvey naal chhatiyan da dudh saadta Dhunvey naal chhatiyan da dudh saadta Jamne ton pehlan aadha putt maarta Jamne ton pehlan aadha putt maarta Jamde nu rogan ne leya ae gher ji 
Kehda laal mayi da banuga sher ji (x4) 
Zehran beej beej ke ugaaiyan faslan Faslan di zehar ne gawaiyan naslan (x2) 
Gauan majjan full kitiyan train ji Tikeyan te gijj gayian dudh dehn ji Tikeyan te gijj gayian dudh dehn ji Koi na fark dudh te sharab da Koi na fark dudh te sharab da Paani peen joga vi reha ni dhaab da Paani peen joga vi reha ni dhaab da 
Chitte da toofan aina baahla ho gaya… 
Rangla Punjab mera kala ho gaya… (x4) 
Ginne chune reh gaye ne khiladi khelde Engine janjaal je Punjab mail de (x2) 
Ho mundeyan nu maar gayian dode bhukkiyan Mundeyan nu maar gayian dode bhukkiyan Dhiyan de ghaman de vich maawan mukkiyan Dhiyan de ghaman de vich maawan mukkiyan 
Bapuji de phull chhpadan ‘ch taar te… 
Gabru Punjabi nasheyan ne maarte Rangle Punjabi nasheyan ne maarte (x2) 
Loki ajj bhul gaye saklika pyar da Chal peya kamm yaaron lutt maar da (x2) 
Bhule sat… Bhule satkaar babeyan di baani da Geeta te shalokan vichli kahani da Geeta te shalokan vichli kahani da Lag paye shaheedan di uddon khilli ji 
Kihda kihda badlu itihaas Delhi ji (x4) 
Ho rabba mereya hoye saiyan mereya Nalajyan di laj tuni odeyan di ott tuni Maaneyan na maan tuni taareyan da tann Tere bina rakhi na kisse te aas ji 
Sunn le tu binti guran de daas di (x4) Song Details:
